generator: 1 { topicOf(S, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- seminar(S). 1 { scheduled(S, R, T, D) : room(R), timeslot(T), day(D) } 1 :- seminar(S).

hard_constraints.description: Room occupied by at most one seminar per slot.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(S1, R, T, D), scheduled(S2, R, T, D), S1 != S2.

hard_constraints.description: AI seminars restricted to morning or midday.
Biology seminars must use multiple rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(_, "Bio"), #count { R : scheduled(S, R, T, D), topicOf(S, "Bio") } < 2.
:- topicOf(S1, "Math"), topicOf(S2, "Math"), scheduled(S1, _, T, D), scheduled(S2, _, T, D), S1 < S2.
:- scheduled(6, R1, _, _), scheduled(7, R2, _, _), R1 != R2.

hard_constraints.description: Seminars 6 and 7 must be different days.
